body: I guess the art was slightly good, just slightly 6/10

Day 21 - 476*
Here I am again, let's go.
Firstly, the white background shows a lack of affection and motivation when doing the manga.
Secondly, the thick black lines surrounding the characters only helps in making the white background seem more present.
Thirdly, the high number of characters, relatively to the number of pages, proves that the author went after quantity and not quality.
Other than that, the art is mediocre and somewhat childish but not bad. A bit more of work would be great to this book and maybe the separation of each character into different mangas for the relationship between them to be worked better.
3/10.
